alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued April 04 at 4:03PM EDT until April 05 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to two inches and ice accumulations of two to three tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of Eastern Upper Michigan. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 10 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages.

area.areaDesc: Central Chippewa; Eastern Mackinac; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island; Southeast Chippewa; Western Chippewa; Western Mackinac
